sentence.Network_en: The schools were adjacent but there were separate doors.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些学校紧挨着，但各自独门独户。

sentence.Network_en: The planes landed on adjacent runways.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些飞机在毗连的跑道上降落。

sentence.Network_en: These young students live in adjacent rooms.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些年轻的学生住在毗连的房间里.

...区域Rj彼此相邻。那么两个区域Ri和Rj是相邻的，邻接可能是4连通或8连通的，邻接关系是自反(reflexive)和对称(symmetric)的。但不一定是可传递(transitive)的，下图显示具有6个截然不同区域的场景邻接图，当它表示区域邻接图(RAG)是。二进制矩阵A成为邻接矩阵(adjacency matrix)，在RAG里。当节点Ni和Nj邻接。在A中。aij是1，因为邻接关系是自反的。矩阵的对角元素都是1，在上图的多区域场景邻接矩阵(关系)如下所示，区域合并和分裂由于在场景中分割单一大
英语词汇-数学词汇_专业词汇 ... adjacent angle 邻角 adjacent side 邻边 adjoint matrix 伴随矩阵.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Latin adjacent- 'lying near to', from adjacere, from ad- 'to' + jacere 'lie down'

entry.def: If one thing is adjacent to another, the two things are next to each other.

example.ex: He sat in an adjacent room and waited...
example.tran: 他坐在隔壁房间里等候。

example.ex: The schools were adjacent but there were separate doors.
example.tran: 这些学校紧挨着，但各自独门独户。

means.word_mean: 1. nearest in space or position; immediately adjoining without intervening space;
2. having a common boundary or edge; touching;

sentences.sentence: "Rhode Island has two bordering states; Massachusetts and Conncecticut"
"the side of Germany conterminous with France"
"Utah and the contiguous state of Idaho"

means.word_mean: 3. near or close to but not necessarily touching;

auth_sentence.content: The fighting also appeared to be affecting adjacent areas.
auth_sentence.res_content: The fighting also appeared to be affecting adjacent areas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fighting also appeared to be affecting adjacent areas.

auth_sentence.content: Adjacent to us rose the mighty mass of the Finsteraarhorn.
auth_sentence.res_content: Adjacent to us rose the mighty mass of the Finsteraarhorn.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Adjacent to us rose the mighty mass of the Finsteraarhorn.

auth_sentence.content: Cease-and-desist letters from Facebook are posted on an adjacent wall.
auth_sentence.res_content: Cease-and-desist letters from Facebook are posted on an adjacent wall.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Cease-and-desist letters from Facebook are posted on an adjacent wall.

means.word_mean: （地区、建筑、房间等 ） 与…毗连的；邻近的

sentences.en: These young students live in adjacent rooms.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻的学生住在毗连的房间里。
我们在毗邻的房间里工作。

jushi.english: The two families live on adjacent streets.
The house adjacent to the church is the vicarage.
jushi.chinese: 毗邻教堂的房子是牧师住宅。

jushi.english: These two men's farms are adjacent to each other.
